About the Company: Singer India Ltd is mainly engaged in the manufacturing of Sewing machines.The product range of the company includes Straight Stitch-Singer Premium,Singer Popular,Singer Star,Merritt Magna and Merritt Taylor.Zig Zag-Singer 8280,Singer4228,Singer 2818 and Singer Trendy.Industrial-Merritt 8103,Merritt Finedge,Merritt Workmate,Merritt Craftsman,Merritt Universl and Merritt Stitch Master..The company also in the business activities of Sewing Machines.
